text: "Old Blue Chair" is a song by Kenny Chesney. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Shaun Silva and was premiered on CMT on December 31, 2004. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of February 17, 2005. The music video reached number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for the week of May 5, 2005. ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:2005 songs Category:Kenny Chesney songs Category:Music videos directed by Shaun Silva
title: Old Blue Chair
